/.social
Warmly Sharing Southernmost Hospitality Since 1963
For over 60 years, Boyd’s Key West Campground has been more than just a place to park your RV or pitch a tent—it’s a beloved tradition at the end of the road and the start of island time.
Founded in 1963 by Boyd and Elsie Hamilton with a homemade camper and a dream, Boyd’s has grown into a tropical getaway for generations of travelers, snowbirds, families, and free spirits. Nestled on the waterfront of Stock Island—just minutes from the sights and sounds of Old Town—Boyd’s blends Southernmost Hospitality with ocean breezes and Conch Republic charm.
From potlucks and turtle races to golden sunsets by the sea, every visit brings something unforgettable. Come see why guests return year after year to relax, reconnect, and experience the real Key West.
Check Rates

ABOUT BOYD's
Experience Boyd’s: History, Happenings & Your Guide to the Keys
From Tent to Tiny Home: Which Boyd’s Site Is Right for You?
At Boyd’s Key West Campground, we believe there’s more than one way to enjoy paradise. Whether you arrive with an RV in tow, a tent on your back, or no gear at all, there’s a perfect site waiting for you under the palms. With a diverse selection of accommodations—including waterfront
Read More
Southernmost Sips & Bites: Our Favorite Local Food Finds Near Boyd’s
When you stay at Boyd’s Key West Campground, you’re not just steps from the sea—you’re also within arm’s reach of some of the most flavorful, authentic, and downright unforgettable dining experiences in the Florida Keys. From dockside seafood shacks to Cuban coffee counters and wood-fired pizzerias, Stock Island and nearby
Read More
The Magic of “Keys Time”: Why Your Watch Doesn’t Matter at Boyd’s Key West Campground
There’s a moment that happens just as the Overseas Highway begins to stretch out over shimmering blue waters. The mainland disappears in your rearview mirror. The sun shines a little brighter. The air gets saltier. And suddenly—you’re not just traveling anymore. You’ve crossed into “Keys Time.” At Boyd’s Key West
Read More

Ways to Stay
Full Hook Up RV Sites
Full hook-up RV sites with 30/50 AMP, water, sewer, and cable—steps from ocean views and palm trees.
Learn More
Tent Camping
Scenic tent sites with picnic tables, grills, and tropical vibes—some right on the waterfront.
Learn More
Tiny Home Rentals
Cozy, modern Tiny Homes for two with A/C, kitchenettes, and island charm—just minutes from Old Town.
Learn More
RV Rentals
Comfortable RV Rentals with island flair—no towing needed, just settle in and start your Key West adventure.
Learn More
Everything You Love About the Keys—Right Around the Corner
At Boyd’s, you’re perfectly placed to soak in the best of Key West without ever being far from your home base. Located on quiet, waterfront Stock Island—just 4 miles from Duval Street—you’re minutes away from world-famous sunsets, conch fritters, coral reefs, and colorful island culture.
Spend your days exploring iconic sights like the Southernmost Point, Hemingway’s House, or the lively Mallory Square Sunset Celebration. Dive into snorkeling trips, art strolls, boat charters, or a casual beachside happy hour.
When the day winds down, return to Boyd’s and trade the crowds for starlit skies, swaying palms, and a seat by the water. It’s the best of both worlds—and it’s all right around the corner.
Local Guide
Fury Water Sports
Relax, Refresh, and Enjoy the Best Campground Amenities in Key West
Explore the Keys by Paddle, Power or Sail
Glide through mangroves by kayak, set sail on a sunset cruise, or book a fishing charter—Boyd’s is your launchpad for unforgettable water adventures in the Keys.
Learn More
Unwind in our heated pool, sway in a hammock, or kick back under the tiki hut—at Boyd’s, relaxation comes naturally under the palms.
Learn More
Dive into Island Relaxation
Souvenirs, Sundries, and Sunset Style
From beachwear to Boyd’s-branded gear, our camp store has everything you need—plus fun finds, local gifts, and that perfect ornament to remember your stay.
Learn More
Grab a bite from rotating food trucks serving up everything from tacos to island BBQ—right here at Boyd’s. No shoes, no problem, just good eats by the palms.
Learn More
Fuel Up Island-Style Without Leaving Camp
From turtle races to Christmas visits from Santa, Boyd’s hosts quirky, heartwarming events that bring campers together—every season, every age, every time.
Learn More
Seasonal Fun, Year-Round Vibes
At Boyd’s, pets are part of the family—enjoy dog-friendly areas, plenty of shade, and tail-wagging walks with an ocean breeze.
Learn More
Paradise Has a Dog Bowl Too

The People Who Make You Feel at Home
Meet the Team Behind the Magic at Boyd's Campground!
Ready to turn your workdays into an adventure? Join the Boyd’s Campground family and become part of a team that’s passionate about creating unforgettable experiences for every guest.
We’re incredibly proud of our dedicated staff—from the smiling faces at the front desk, to the behind-the-scenes heroes in maintenance, to the friendly professionals keeping things safe and secure. Every role here is essential, and together we deliver the kind of warm, genuine “Southernmost Hospitality” our guests rave about from check-in to checkout.
If you’re looking to live and work in paradise, there’s no better place than Boyd’s. Come be a part of something special—we can’t wait to meet you!
Learn More
JOIN OUR TEAM!

A Slice of Paradise Since 1963
60 Years of Campfires, Conch Shells, and Southernmost Hospitality™
For over 60 years, Boyd’s Key West Campground has welcomed travelers with warm smiles, ocean breezes, and a deep-rooted love for island life. What began in 1963 as a dream built on coral rock and hard work has grown into Key West’s most beloved campground—still family-run, still full of heart. Today, we carry on that legacy with every guest we greet, every sunset we share, and every moment of Southernmost Hospitality™ we deliver.
Find your perfect place to stay and start making memories today!
RESERVATIONS
Find your perfect place to stay and start making memories today!
RESERVATIONS

/.social
From Bingo to Tie Dye
Pavilion Features & Fun Events
Get ready for good times, great company, and plenty of island vibes!
Seasonal Live Music & Entertainment –
Enjoy performances from local artists and talented musicians.
Seasonal Celebrations & Holiday Events –
From our festive Christmas RV Site Decoration Contest to themed cookouts and karaoke nights, there’s always something fun happening!
Camper Socials & Potlucks –
Meet fellow travelers, share stories, and enjoy delicious food.
Special Gatherings –
Host birthdays, family reunions, and private events in a tropical setting.
Location:
Centrally located near campground amenities.
Pro Tip:
Check our event board or ask the front desk about upcoming Pavilion activities—you won’t want to miss them!
Choose from beachfront or terrace rooms, each designed for a relaxing stay just steps from the lake. Enjoy a private balcony or terrace, plush bedding, and modern amenities.
Beachfront & Lake View Rooms –
Balcony, two double beds or king bed (select rooms)
Terrace Room –
Private patio, two double beds, peaceful setting
Amenities:

Not pet-friendly

Relax, Unwind, & Experience Boyd’s Community Spirit
Whether you’re here for an evening of live music, a friendly game night, or just looking to mingle with fellow campers, the Pavilion is the perfect spot to soak up the laid-back, welcoming atmosphere that makes Boyd’s Key West Campground so special.
Want to Plan an Event?
Ask our team about reserving the Pavilion for your own private gathering!

Your Keys Paddle Adventure Awaits
Paddle Your Way to Adventure
Whether you’re a seasoned paddler or a first-timer, kayaking and paddleboarding are relaxing, fun, and the perfect way to soak in the beauty of the Florida Keys.
Kayak Rentals –
Single and tandem options available for a smooth, scenic ride.
Paddleboard Rentals –
Test your balance and enjoy a peaceful paddle along the shoreline.
Wildlife Watching –
Spot dolphins, manatees, and vibrant marine life in their natural habitat.
Sunrise & Sunset Paddles –
Experience the magic of the Keys with golden-hour views.
Rental Hours:
Available daily—check with the office for availability.
Choose from beachfront or terrace rooms, each designed for a relaxing stay just steps from the lake. Enjoy a private balcony or terrace, plush bedding, and modern amenities.
Beachfront & Lake View Rooms –
Balcony, two double beds or king bed (select rooms)
Terrace Room –
Private patio, two double beds, peaceful setting
Amenities:
Private bath, A/C, Wi-Fi, mini fridge, coffee maker, daily housekeeping
Not pet-friendly
Book your AquaVista getaway today!
Why Paddle at Boyd’s?
Paddling at Boyd’s is an easy, fun, and eco-friendly way to explore the island’s calm mangroves, hidden coves, and incredible marine life, all just steps from your campsite.
No Transport Needed –
Just grab your paddle and launch right from our shore.
Easy & Fun for All Ages –
No experience required—just hop on and enjoy!
Eco-Friendly Adventure –
The perfect way to explore Key West’s natural beauty without a motor.
Ready to paddle?
Stop by the front desk to reserve your rental!
Choose from beachfront or terrace rooms, each designed for a relaxing stay just steps from the lake. Enjoy a private balcony or terrace, plush bedding, and modern amenities.

Terrace Room –
Private patio, two double beds, peaceful setting
Amenities:
